introduce.title: Introduction to DH Mobile
introduce.smallTitle: DH Mobile is a genuine smartphone retail system with a mission to deliver high-quality technology products, dedicated customer service, and a convenient, transparent shopping experience for Vietnamese consumers.
introduce.smallTitle2: Founded with the desire to bridge the gap between advanced technology and users, DH Mobile always upholds 'Trust' as the guiding principle in all business activities. We understand that each phone is not just a communication tool, but a means to connect with the world, to study, work, and be entertained every day.
introduce.descCard1: All products at DH Mobile are 100% genuine, with clear origin and full VAT invoices and electronic warranty. We are committed to never selling hand-carried goods, floating stock, or low-quality products. Each item delivered to customers is carefully inspected to ensure it remains sealed, intact, and includes all original accessories from the manufacturer.
introduce.descCard2: DH Mobile has built a team of professional consultants, well-trained to assist customers in every situation – from product recommendations to technical support, warranty processing, and complaint resolution. We believe that customer satisfaction comes not only from quality products but also from thoughtful and attentive service.
introduce.descCard3: At DH Mobile, all policies on returns, warranties, installment plans, and promotions are clearly published on our website and in-store systems. Customers can easily look up information, understand their rights, and receive prompt assistance. Especially, we offer a '1-for-1 exchange within 7 days' policy for manufacturer defects, along with extended warranty and lifetime technical support.
introduce.descCard4: DH Mobile aims to become the most trusted smartphone retail chain in Vietnam. We don't just sell phones – we accompany users on their journey to explore technology. Our mission is to deliver sustainable value, where customers always feel secure, trusted, and satisfied when choosing DH Mobile.
introduce.titleCard5: Thank You to Our Valued Customers
introduce.descCard5: DH Mobile sincerely thanks our valued customers for their trust and support throughout the years. Every order, every piece of feedback, and every return visit is the motivation for us to improve, grow, and serve better every day.

guaranteePolicy.title: Warranty Policy
guaranteePolicy.intro: DH Mobile is committed to providing customers with high-quality products and reputable after-sales service. Below are the terms of our warranty policy:
guaranteePolicy.content2_1: Product must be within the warranty period and have a warranty seal/card.
guaranteePolicy.content2_2: Technical faults caused by the manufacturer (not by external impact).
guaranteePolicy.content2_3: No hardware interference or disassembly outside authorized service centers.
guaranteePolicy.content3_1: Product damaged by dropping, water, or misuse (causing fire/explosion).
guaranteePolicy.content3_2: Missing warranty seal/card or mismatched serial number.
guaranteePolicy.content3_3: Unauthorized repairs not approved by DH Mobile.
guaranteePolicy.content4_1: After the warranty period, DH Mobile still offers repair services at a preferential cost.
guaranteePolicy.footer: For inquiries, please contact our hotline: 1900 1234 or visit any DH Mobile store directly.

returnPolicy.title: Return Policy
returnPolicy.intro: DH Mobile is committed to protecting customers' rights with a flexible return policy. Below are the terms and conditions:
returnPolicy.content1_1: The product must be intact and show no signs of use.
returnPolicy.content1_2: The product must be accompanied by a purchase invoice and warranty seal.
returnPolicy.content1_3: Returns must be made within 7 days from the date of purchase.
returnPolicy.content2_1: Contact DH Mobile via hotline or visit the store.
returnPolicy.content2_2: Provide the purchase invoice and reason for the return.
returnPolicy.content2_3: Wait for the return to be processed within 3–5 working days.
returnPolicy.content3_1: The product has been used, scratched, or damaged due to user error.
returnPolicy.content3_2: The product is missing the invoice or warranty seal.
returnPolicy.content3_3: The product is damaged due to external impact (dropped, water damage, etc.).
returnPolicy.content4_1: If the product cannot be returned, DH Mobile will issue a refund via bank transfer or in-store refund.
returnPolicy.footer: For any questions, please contact our hotline: 1900 1234 or visit DH Mobile store directly.

deliveryPolicy.title: Delivery Policy
deliveryPolicy.intro: DH Mobile is committed to fast and secure delivery to customers. Below are the terms of our delivery policy:
deliveryPolicy.content1_1: Home delivery via express shipping service.
deliveryPolicy.content1_2: In-store pickup at DH Mobile upon customer request.
deliveryPolicy.content2_1: Orders within the city: Delivered within 1–2 working days.
deliveryPolicy.content2_2: Orders outside the city: Delivered within 3–5 working days.
deliveryPolicy.content2_3: Delivery time may vary depending on location and order status.
deliveryPolicy.content3_1: Delivery fees are calculated based on the delivery area and order weight. The fees will be clearly communicated before payment.
deliveryPolicy.content4_1: DH Mobile offers free delivery for orders valued over 1,000,000 VND or during special promotional programs.
deliveryPolicy.content5_1: Customers may cancel their order before it is shipped.
deliveryPolicy.content5_2: Shipped orders cannot be canceled unless the issue is caused by DH Mobile.
deliveryPolicy.footer: For any questions, please contact our hotline: 1900 1234 or visit DH Mobile store directly.
